name: The Coffee Machine
description:
EXPERIENCE BEING AN (PRACTICALLY) IMMORTAL MAD DOCTOR!

Based on the stories of the SCP Foundation, this revolutionary game puts you in the role of Dr. Bright: a mad scientist testing SCP-294 "The Coffee Machine".

Request every thing you can think and drink it! Why not? You're immortal (and MAD).

Start playing this game with +100 drinks OMFG!

Or cooperate in the forum for adding more drinks or any crazy idea.

Every time you play the collection of drinks expands! Controls:
  • Use the mouse.
  • Double click to drink.
  • Drag and drop the drinks to the trash to get rid of them.
